// ✅ Nombres descriptivos y significativos
class ProductPriceCalculator { // [!code ++]
  private products: Product[] = []; // [!code ++]
  
  calculateTotalPrice(products: Product[]): number { // [!code ++]
    let subtotal = 0; // [!code ++]
    let taxes = 0; // [!code ++]
    
    for (const product of products) { // [!code ++]
      if (product.isActive) { // [!code ++]
        const itemTotal = product.price * product.quantity; // [!code ++]
        subtotal += itemTotal; // [!code ++]
        taxes += itemTotal * TAX_RATE; // [!code ++]
      } // [!code ++]
    } // [!code ++]
    
    return subtotal + taxes; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  isValidProduct(product: Product): boolean { // [!code ++]
    return product && product.price > 0 && product.quantity > 0; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
} // [!code ++]

const TAX_RATE = 0.15; // [!code ++]

interface Product { // [!code ++]
  price: number; // [!code ++]
  quantity: number; // [!code ++]
  isActive: boolean; // [!code ++]
} // [!code ++]

secureSecrets.after:
// ✅ Gestión segura de secretos usando variables de entorno
class DatabaseConfig {
  private readonly connectionString: string; // [!code ++]
  private readonly jwtSecret: string; // [!code ++]
  private readonly apiKeys: ApiKeys; // [!code ++]
  
  constructor() { // [!code ++]
    this.validateEnvironment(); // [!code ++]
    
    this.connectionString = this.buildConnectionString(); // [!code ++]
    this.jwtSecret = this.getRequiredEnvVar('JWT_SECRET'); // [!code ++]
    this.apiKeys = this.loadApiKeys(); // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  async connect(): Promise<pg.Client> { // [!code ++]
    return pg.connect(this.connectionString); // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  generateToken(payload: any): string { // [!code ++]
    if (!this.jwtSecret) { // [!code ++]
      throw new Error('JWT secret not configured'); // [!code ++]
    } // [!code ++]
    
    return jwt.sign(payload, this.jwtSecret, { expiresIn: '24h' }); // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  private buildConnectionString(): string { // [!code ++]
    const host = this.getRequiredEnvVar('DB_HOST'); // [!code ++]
    const port = this.getRequiredEnvVar('DB_PORT'); // [!code ++]
    const database = this.getRequiredEnvVar('DB_NAME'); // [!code ++]
    const username = this.getRequiredEnvVar('DB_USER'); // [!code ++]
    const password = this.getRequiredEnvVar('DB_PASSWORD'); // [!code ++]
    
    return `postgresql://${username}:${password}@${host}:${port}/${database}`; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  private getRequiredEnvVar(name: string): string { // [!code ++]
    const value = process.env[name]; // [!code ++]
    if (!value) { // [!code ++]
      throw new Error(`Missing required environment variable: ${name}`); // [!code ++]
    } // [!code ++]
    return value; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
}

// ✅ Con caché inteligente y estratificado
class ProductService {
  constructor( // [!code ++]
    private cache: CacheService, // [!code ++]
    private db: DatabaseService // [!code ++]
  ) {} // [!code ++]
  
  async getProduct(id: number): Promise<Product> { // [!code ++]
    const cacheKey = `product:${id}`; // [!code ++]
    
    let product = await this.cache.get<Product>(cacheKey); // [!code focus]
    if (product) { // [!code focus]
      return product; // [!code focus]
    } // [!code focus]
    
    product = await this.fetchProductWithCalculations(id); // [!code ++]
    
    await this.cache.set(cacheKey, product, { // [!code focus]
      ttl: 3600, // 1 hora // [!code focus]
      tags: ['product', `product-${id}`] // [!code focus]
    }); // [!code focus]
    
    return product; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  async getPopularProducts(): Promise<Product[]> { // [!code ++]
    const cacheKey = 'products:popular'; // [!code ++]
    
    let products = await this.cache.get<Product[]>(cacheKey); // [!code focus]
    if (products) { // [!code focus]
      return products; // [!code focus]
    } // [!code focus]
    
    products = await this.db.products.findMany({ // [!code ++]
      where: { featured: true }, // [!code ++]
      include: { category: true }, // [!code ++]
      orderBy: { viewCount: 'desc' }, // [!code ++]
      take: 10 // [!code ++]
    }); // [!code ++]
    
    await this.cache.set(cacheKey, products, { // [!code focus]
      ttl: 1800, // 30 minutos // [!code focus]
      tags: ['products', 'popular'] // [!code focus]
    }); // [!code focus]
    
    return products; // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
  
  async invalidateProductCache(productId: number): Promise<void> { // [!code ++]
    await this.cache.invalidateByTags([`product-${productId}`, 'popular']); // [!code ++]
  } // [!code ++]
}
